OfcrDirTrusteesOrKeyEmployee.PersonName: MR IRENEE E du PONT JR
OfcrDirTrusteesOrKeyEmployee.Title: VICE PRESIDENT

SummaryOfDirectCharitableActy.Description1: Longwood Gardens, Inc., located in Kennett Square, Pennsylvania, is the living legacy of Pierre S. du Pont, inspiring people through excellence in garden design, horticulture, education, and the arts. Longwood Gardens is open year-round and during the year ended September 30, 2010 served in excess of 870,000 visitors. Longwood Gardens sponsors an annual meeting of the Visiting Committee, which reviews the overall operation of the Gardens and issues a consensus report offering various methods for improvement. Total expenses for direct charitable activities were $40,287,449. Longwood Gardens also offers a wide variety of continuing education courses dealing with various horticultural subjects.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExemptPrps.RelationshipStatement: ADMISSION INCOME ACCOUNTS FOR 56% OF OPERATING INCOME AND 34% OF TOTAL INCOME WITHOUT WHICH OUR GOAL OF PROVIDING A WORLD CLASS HORTICULTURAL DISPLAY WOULD BE IMPOSSIBLE TO ACCOMPLISH.
CONTINUING EDUCATION COURSES ARE HORTICULTURALLY RELATED , THEREBY CREATING GREATER UNDERSTANDING AND APPRECIATION OF LONGWOOD'S EXEMPT PURPOSE.

LONGWOOD SPONSORS PERFORMANCES IN ITS OUTDOOR AMPHITHEATER, AND IN OTHER GARDEN LOCATIONS, WITH THE INTENTION OF ADDING TO THE GARDENS VISITATION EXPERIENCE AND CULTIVATING A GREATER HORTICULTURAL INTEREST IN THOSE WHO ATTEND.
THE ACTIVITIES COMMITTEE ORGANIZES EMPLOYEE OUTINGS WITH THE GOAL OF BOOSTING EMPLOYEE MORALE AND FOSTERING A "TEAMWORK" ATMOSPHERE AMONG EMPLOYEES.
MISCELLANEOUS INCOME INCLUDES REFUNDS AND REIMBURSEMENTS THAT OFFSET EXPENSES INCURRED DURING THE NORMAL COURSE OF BUSINESS.
